name: browser
description: Control Chrome browser automatically: navigate, click, type, scroll, screenshot

tools.name: browser_action
tools.description: Controls Chrome browser automatically. Actions: navigate(url), click(index), type(index, text), key_press(key), scroll(direction), read(), wait_for_page_change(timeout, interval), screenshot(), back(), close(). After each action, returns updated list of interactive elements with index numbers.

promptRules: When the user asks to "open a website", "go to a page", "search on Baidu/Google", "register an account", "log in", "fill a form", or any task that involves interacting with a webpage, you MUST use browser_action. Use web_search only when you need to look up information, NOT when the user wants you to operate a browser.
When using browser_action, you MUST continue step by step. After navigate, read the elements list, then use click/type to interact with the page. Do NOT give up or say you cannot do it.
If a page requires QR code scanning, SMS verification, CAPTCHA, or any manual user action, tell the user what to do, then use wait_for_page_change to poll until the page changes.
